item.title: Death investigation underway on Carnival cruise ship, authorities say
item.description: Authorities are investigating a death on a Carnival cruise ship.

item.title: 2 people found dead along an Arkansas hiking trail in a ‘suspected homicide’
item.description: Two people were found dead along a walking trail in a state park in Arkansas, authorities said Sunday.

item.title: Officer completes DoorDash delivery after driver is arrested
item.description: A police officer in New Mexico has taken “serve and protect” to a new level.

item.title: 5 hospitalized after Charlotte Harbor boat crash
item.description: Multiple agencies rushed to respond to a single-vehicle boat crash Saturday.

item.title: Officer accused of asking for sexual favors from a domestic violence victim
item.description: A police officer is accused of asking for sexual favors from a domestic violence victim.

item.title: Firefighters unite to extinguish Punta Gorda garage fire
item.description: Seven fire engines came together Saturday to save a Punta Gorda home from an encroaching blaze.

item.title: One burnt in Turtle Bay blaze
item.description: One person is now recovering after their entire boat caught fire Saturday morning.

item.title: UPDATE: Swimmer identified in Saturday morning Venice drowning death
item.description: Officials say they are working to identify the body and notify next of kin.

item.title: Tampa just hit 100° for the first time ever… here’s why it took 135 years
item.description: Plus, why the Suncoast was much cooler.

item.title: Suncoast activists host immigration issues forum
item.description: The forum featured speakers including Human rights activist and public educator Reverand Charles McKenzie, Attorney CJ Czaia, and Attorney Victoria Bruno.

item.title: Florida just broke its own heat rules… and the next twist is coming
